org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant

Class Recovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant.Recovery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetricsRecovery

    public class Recovery
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for managing failure detection and recovery. The default Recovery is created by PlantConfiguration.

      • Recovery

        public Recovery()

    • Method Detail

      • getReactorPollMillis

        public int getReactorPollMillis()
        Controls how frequently reactors are polled for message timeouts.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds between polls. Default = 500.

      • getMessageTimeoutMillis

        public int getMessageTimeoutMillis(ReactorMtImpl _reactorImpl)
        Determines how long a message can be processed before timing out. Default for Blocking reactors: 5 minutes. Default for all other reactors: 1 second.
        Parameters:
        _reactorImpl - The reactor which may have a timed-out message.
        Returns:
        Number of milliseconds.

      • onMessageTimeout

        public void onMessageTimeout(ReactorImpl _reactorImpl)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles message timeout. Default action: close the reactor.
        Parameters:
        _reactorImpl - The reactor with the timed-out message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getThreadInterruptMillis

        public int getThreadInterruptMillis(ReactorImpl _reactorImpl)
        Determines how long a delay after a thread interrupt before the thread is considered hung. Default: 1 second.
        Parameters:
        _reactorImpl - The reactor whose thread is being interrupted.
        Returns:
        Number of milliseconds.

      • onHungThread

        public void onHungThread(ReactorImpl _reactorImpl)
        Handles hung thread. Default action: close the plant and exit the program.
        Parameters:
        _reactorImpl - The reactor whose thread is hung.

      • onHungRequest

        public void onHungRequest(RequestMtImpl<?> _requestImpl)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles hung request. Default action: close the reactor.
        Parameters:
        _requestImpl - The reactor with the hung request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • onStackOverflowError

        public void onStackOverflowError(RequestMtImpl<?> _requestImpl,
                        java.lang.StackOverflowError _error)
        Handles StackOverflowError. Default action: close the reactor.
        Parameters:
        _requestImpl - The reactor with the hung request.
        _error - The StackOverflowError.

      • onRuntimeException

        public void onRuntimeException(RequestMtImpl<?> _requestImpl,
                      java.lang.RuntimeException _exception)
        Handles RuntimeException. Default action: close the reactor.
        Parameters:
        _requestImpl - The reactor with the hung request.
        _exception - The runtime exception

      • getMetricsTimer

        public MetricsTimer getMetricsTimer(java.lang.String _name)
        Returns the MetricsTimer used to track the performance of this Request instance.
        Parameters:
        _name - The name of the timer.
        Returns:
        the DummyMetricsTimer.
